ygData.subject: Re: patchwork, studded and reinforced leather armour question
ygData.msgSnippet: You have to buy a BIG sewing kits to do the other two kind of leather armor Eriz ... From: Yap Sieh Roy  To:
ygData.messageBody:
You have to buy a BIG sewing kits to do the other two kind of leather armor


Eriz

----- Original Message -----
From: Yap Sieh Roy <sryap@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 6:47 PM
Subject: [sg-everquest] patchwork, studded and reinforced leather armour
question


> From: "Yap Sieh Roy" <sryap@...>
>
> hi,
>
> been trying to practise my tailoring skillz.. i got a couple of questions
> abt making armour, hope u guys can help.
>
> ruined pelt + pattern = patchwork armour
> medium pelt + studs + pattern = studded armour
> hi-quality pelt + file + pattern = reinforced armour
>
> the above is as far as i understand from the tailoring book. there is only
2
> slots in the sewing kit so.patchwork is no problem but what about studded
> and reinforced where 3 items are required? what is the sequence of making
> them ?
>
> thanks !
> roy
>
>
